channel.title: [317] Need help. Nobody can connect. Will +Rep! TeamViewer Please!
channel.description:
Before I rant on my problem.. I will start out by saying TeamViewer is your best bet at helping my in this problem. So please help via that way if possible.
I HAVE FOLLOWED COUNTLESS TUTORIALS IN WHICH NONE WORKED. PEOPLE STILL GET AND ERROR WHEN TRYING TO CONNECT.
Reply on here is available to help!
-Now-
I have ran a server before on my own... it took forever to start up due to the fact that nobody could join although canyouseeme.org said 43594 was opened. I used uTorrent and No-IP's DUC as a combination to have people connect, once I finally got it. Well, now I have the same problem and can't remember what I did to fix it. Canyouseeme.org said 43594 was opened (ONLY WHEN uTORRENT IS OPENED), when it was closed uTorrent was also closed. What I'm trying to say is that my server wont let anybody on it. Moparscape's status checker said it was "ONLINE" but I am trying to connect and cannot, even from their webclient on 127.0.0.1. I have the source set up to my No-IP and it was running when I tested it every time. So, I need somebody to help via Teamviewer to show me what I'm doing wrong in startup or setup.. THANKS FOR READING THIS!!!

item.title: [317] Need help. Nobody can connect. Will +Rep! TeamViewer Please!
item.dc:creator: @Mr.czar Mr.czar
item.description:
@Mr.czar wrote:

Hybrid pvp your ip must not be set to your no-ip but your reg ip not local ip’s tho just use whatsmyip.org use the ip it tells you.

Read full topic
